text:
brahma#Naqspati#mEqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvAsmai# sajAqtAn pra ya#cCati grAqmyE#va Ba#vati gaqNava#tI yAjyAnuvAqkyE# BavataH sajAqtairEqvaina#M gaqNava#ntaM karOtyEqtAmEqva nirva#pEqdyaH kAqmayE#taq brahmaqn 
viSaqM ~Mvi nA#SayEyaqmiti# mAruqtI yA$jyAnuvAqkyE# kuryAqd brahma#nnEqva viSaqM ~Mvi nA#Sayati || 19 (tEja#H - saqmIcI$ - brahmavarcaqsyE#va - grAma#kAmaq - strica#tvAri(gm)Sacca ) (A3)
